original_title: Security measures to safeguard tourists and citizens from potential threats - Sri Lanka Police
original_body_lines: The police and intelligence divisions, under the direction of the Ministry of Public Security, are taking proactive measures to ensure the safety of tourists and citizens against any potential threats, Sri Lanka Police said.
Issuing a special statement, the police department urged the public and tourists to report any emergencies or relevant information by contacting the emergency hotline ‘1997’.
